name: Real Zombie?
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

or download for windows

You find yourself stuck in some clear super glue in the middle of a zombie apocalypse with just your gun and some ammo. Zombies are coming at you, but some zombies aren't real. In order to preserve your ammo you must try not to shoot fake zombies. use your real detector device to eliminate fake zombies. Survive 5 waves to win.

I'm 13 and this is my 2nd game jam it has very much improved from my last game which was terrible.
